name: Project Imagine
description:
The World of Niyvis had been destroyed by a Dark Mage, leaving an empty planet. Only an Eabred born with power of Phantasie can put the world back together.

This game is currently in Alpha State. We are looking for Game Testers and Developers to help with this project. You must be familiar with Game Maker: Studio and is required to be an Intermediate user.

Feedback is highly requested and will use most or all to better the game experience. If you are interested in helping with the project, please either leave a comment, PM me or Email me at: kevinryansmith.tkp@gmail.com

Please be sure to read the "README.txt" file included with installation. All details of the game, controls and system requirements are located there.
